publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-358 Campbell Martin: Dr Henry Faulds - Pioneer of Fingerprintingâ€”That the Parliament acknowledges the pioneering work carried out by Scotsman Dr Henry Faulds in the scientific study of fingerprints; recognises that Dr Faulds, who was born in Beith, Ayrshire, in 1843, first published his findings on the forensic application of fingerprinting in the Nature Magazine in 1880, some years ahead of contemporaries in the field, and therefore should be recognised as the true pioneer of fingerprinting, and acknowledges the work of the Dr Henry Faulds - Beith Commemorative Society in seeking to recognise the work and achievements of Dr Faulds by securing funds to provide a permanent memorial in the town.
S2M-358 Dr Henry Faulds - Pioneer of Fingerprinting (lodged on 16 September 2003) Alex Neil*

S2M-358 Dr Henry Faulds - Pioneer of Fingerprinting (lodged on 16 September 2003) Brian Adam*, Fergus Ewing*, Phil Gallie*, Christine Grahame*, Richard Lochhead*, Tricia Marwick*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Christine May*, Mr Jamie Stone*

S2M-358 Campbell Martin: Dr Henry Faulds - Pioneer of Fingerprinting-That the Parliament acknowledges the pioneering work carried out by Scotsman Dr Henry Faulds in the scientific study of fingerprints; recognises that Dr Faulds, who was born in Beith, Ayrshire, in 1843, first published his findings on the forensic application of fingerprinting in the Nature Magazine in 1880, some years ahead of contemporaries in the field, and therefore should be recognised as the true pioneer of fingerprinting, and acknowledges the work of the Dr Henry Faulds - Beith Commemorative Society in seeking to recognise the work and achievements of Dr Faulds by securing funds to provide a permanent memorial in the town. Supported by: Alex Neil, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Phil Gallie, Christine Grahame, Richard Lochhead, Tricia Marwick, Michael Matheson, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Ms Sandra White, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Rob Gibson, Robin Harper, Christine May, Mr Jamie Stone, Chris Ballance*, Margo MacDonald*
S2M-358 Dr Henry Faulds - Pioneer of Fingerprinting (lodged on 16 September 2003) Mr Bruce McFee*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-358 Dr Henry Faulds - Pioneer of Fingerprinting (lodged on 16 September 2003) Mr David Davidson*, Donald Gorrie*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-358 Dr Henry Faulds - Pioneer of Fingerprinting (lodged on 16 September 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
